title: Debit transfer
name: debit_transfer
description: A direct debit can only be performed with a valid sepa mandate, which holds the paying party

account_id.description: Fidor account this transaction belongs to.

transaction_id.description: For successful transfers, the reference to the transaction

transaction.description: The related transaction if the transfer was processed.

mandate_id.description: The sepa mandate used by the debit

amount.description: The transferred amount in account currency, two decimal places

debit_note_date.description: Date the debit will be withdrawn from the foreign account.

state.description: State of the transfer. pending: Order has not been approved yet | in_clearance: Order is currently being processed | cleared: Order was handed to third party system but booking was not confirmed | processed: Third party system confirmed booking of order | rejected: Order was rejected | error: An error occurred during execution

filter[account_ids].title: Find transfers belonging to the given account ids. Single id or multiple ids comma-separated.

filter[states].title: Filter by single or multiple csv delimited states

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
